roasts.name: Cool Dude (Colombia)
roasts.tasting_notes: Darker than I expected, darker than I prefer. Fine for cold brew, pretty good for an old school ristretto. Not what I'm looking for in drip.

roasts.name: Goodie (Guatemala)
roasts.tasting_notes: Darker than I expected, darker than I prefer. Fine for cold brew, pretty good for an old school ristretto. Not what I'm looking for in drip.
